title: National Library of Guinea-Bissau
text:
The Biblioteca Pública do INEP is the <a href="national%20library">national library</a> of <a href="Guinea-Bissau">Guinea-Bissau</a> and it is located in <a href="Bissau">Bissau</a>. It is also the biggest public library in the country and serves as library of the <a href="Universidade%20Am%C3%ADlcar%20Cabral">Universidade Amílcar Cabral</a>.
It was founded in 1984 and inherited the <a href="library%20catalog">library catalog</a> of the colonial library in <a href="Portuguese%20Guinea">Portuguese Guinea</a>.
It is part of the National Research Institute "Instituto Nacional de Estudos e Pesquisa" (INEP).
The "american corner" library at the INEP was opened in 2011. With its next <a href="Diplomatic%20mission">embassy</a> located in <a href="Dakar">Dakar</a>, Senegal, it is the only public American presence in the country.
The rich cultural patrimony of Guinea-Bissau, is hold together in this first library of the country. 
Currently, a digitization project and training programme of the CPLP supports document conservation and electronic cataloging.
